content:
Human-rated Examples:
Example 1:
Text: You shouldn't accuse your parents of doing things.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 2:
Text: It's not okay to make someone feel worthless.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 3:
Text: You should not pursue a relationship with someone much younger than you.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 4:
Text: It's okay to be angry and file a complaint against a supervisor making sexual advances towards you.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 5:
Text: You shouldn't do something that would make social services show up.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 6:
Text: You shouldn't jaywalk because it's illegal.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 7:
Text: It's understandable to be scared to change and try new things
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 8:
Text: You have the right to date anyone you choose.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 9:
Text: You can't expect people to own up to their mistakes.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 10:
Text: It's wrong to tell your partner they are selfish.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 11:
Text: You should know your own physical limits.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 12:
Text: You're expected to talk to your roommate.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 13:
Text: You shouldn't write fake confessions online.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 14:
Text: It's wrong to demand special attention from people who aren't your spouse.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 15:
Text: You should always try to be understanding of others and their confessions.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 16:
Text: It's ok to break up with someone who cheated on you.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 17:
Text: It's okay to avoid people who hate you.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 18:
Text: It's expected that people feel satisfied when they do too much of some things, which is why they continue to do them past the point of safety.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 19:
Text: It's rude to tell someone to stop sitting by you.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 20:
Text: It's fine to not want to get involved with family fighting.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 21:
Text: It's bad to do illegal drugs.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 22:
Text: It is expected that there will be disagreements in a relationship.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 23:
Text: Sometimes people need a dose of their own medicine.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 24:
Text: It's bad to arrive to work dishevelled.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 25:
Text: You shouldn't ignore someone talking to you to look at your phone.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 26:
Text: It's good to have someone's favorite food with them.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 27:
Text: It's rude to decline food that a host offers you.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 28:
Text: It's important to prioritize your own mental health.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 29:
Text: It's not okay to not deal with your emotional problems.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 30:
Text: You shouldn't yell at your roommates.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Estimated Examples:
Example 1:
Text: It's not okay to find a partner's siblings attractive.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 2:
Text: It's normal for people who believe in certain religions to send their children to Sunday school.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 3:
Text: It is unwise to quit taking your psych meds.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 4:
Text: When you make online purchases, you should take precautions to keep from being scammed.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 5:
Text: It's not good to linger on the past for a long time
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 6:
Text: It's good to share your ideas for food products with others.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 7:
Text: It can be difficult to get over a breakup.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 8:
Text: It's allowed to consume your food in whatever non-standard way you want.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 9:
Text: You shouldn't get back together with someone after a breakup.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 10:
Text: It's wrong to get worried over everything.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 11:
Text: It's good for a child to have a realistic view of their parents.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 12:
Text: It's good to help out your ex.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 13:
Text: It's good to want to be prepared for the future.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 14:
Text: If you're married to someone, you should be proud of your choice and do what you can to maintain your love for them.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 15:
Text: It is unacceptable to cheat on your spouse.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 16:
Text: It's understandable to be angry when someone lies about their health.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 17:
Text: You shouldn't do things that would make someone feel the need to hate you.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 18:
Text: It's wrong to take unwarranted sick days.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 19:
Text: It's understandable to be uncomfortable with people that are different than you.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 20:
Text: It's nice to keep pets.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 21:
Text: It's not okay to make someone's life more difficult that it has to be.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 22:
Text: If you're male and heterosexual, you shouldn't cross dress because it's weird.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 23:
Text: You shouldn't criticize people for adopting their kids instead of having their own.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 24:
Text: Parents should involve children in their problems
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 25:
Text: It's ok to have an opinion.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 26:
Text: It's understandable to not be attracted to people.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 27:
Text: It's wrong for a parent to do things to make their children loose respect of them.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 28:
Text: It's understandable to feel upset at times.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 29:
Text: It’s wrong to give up on your kids.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 30:
Text: People should find ways of addressing their mental issues.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Target Example:
Text: It's good to help your kids with homework.
Annotation from annotator:
